content.en: Transmission Expansion Algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to address the challenges of transmission expansion planning in the presence of renewable energy sources. These algorithms, such as the Benders decomposition algorithm and the Genetic Algorithm, play a crucial role in finding optimal solutions for expanding transmission networks. By incorporating these algorithms, researchers aim to improve the efficiency, robustness, and flexibility of transmission expansion planning, ultimately facilitating the integration of renewable energy into the power grid.
content.da: Transmissionsudvidelsesalgoritmer: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at tackle udfordringerne ved transmissionsudvidelsesplanlægning i nærværelse af vedvarende energikilder. Disse algoritmer, såsom Benders dekompositionsalgoritme og den genetiske algoritme, spiller en afgørende rolle i at finde optimale løsninger til udvidelse af transmissionsnetværk. Ved at inkorporere disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten, robustheden og fleksibiliteten i transmissionsudvidelsesplanlægning, hvilket i sidste ende letter integrationen af vedvarende energi i elnettet.
